'' again, Betty White quips, ''I think you do a thing once and then you run like a thief.'' David Letterman then asks her what she does in her free time and Betty White says, Oh, I like to do most anything. Play with animals, mostly. And vodka's kind of a hobby. So David Letterman reaches down from behind the desk and produces a bottle of Grey Goose, to which Betty White laughs heartily. They share some vodka, then she does a classic spit-take. The more Chrysler management, including CEO Sergio Marchionne , spoke with him, the more they realized they shared the same passion for the city, and he agreed to be in the commercial. We weren't looking to make him a spokesperson or a sales pitch guy. We wanted him to talk from the heart, Garlick says. It just felt natural for him to deliver the final line in the script: ''This is the Motor City, and this is what we do.'' The spot was directed and shot
